timeline.message:
Fix issue with Push unsubscribe URL. (#8330)

Related to #8177

Workaround a bug in the external reflection library. (#8431)

Fixes #8371

Force pnpm version >=4.4.0, <4.6.0 (#8452)

Fixes #8434
Set z-index to all direct children of vaadin-devmode-gizmo's shadow DOM root (#8470)

Removing deprecated parameter from DataNode constructor (#8325)

If you use container (such as the latest Wilfdly) which forces to use significantly newer version of Jsoup than Vaadin depends to, this can cause a problem as deprecated method as been removed.
Fix Javadoc typo in NavigationTargetFilter (#8467)

Close UI after refreshing the page in PreserveOnRefresh case and mark it
(#8365)

Fixes #8286


# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/router/internal/AbstractNavigationStateRenderer.java

Close client app on change location (#8334)

Fixes #8177
# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/component/page/Page.java
#	flow-server/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/component/page/PageTest.java

Listen detach events on "listenOn" components in shortcut registration (#8391)

Fixes #8247

Don't override initial value of hidden HTML Element attribute. (#8419)

Fixes #8100
Remove extra check.
Adapt test code for 2.x branch
Adapt test code for 2.x branch
Adjust push connection test for 2.x branch.
Disable devmode gizmo if no devserver (#8489)
Updated doclink for live-reload (#8484)
Removed use of non-existent method in IT
Default implemention of isDevModeLiveRelaodEnabled
Test that live reload is disabled when compatibility mode is enabled in default configuration
Update chrome driver to 83.0.4103.39 (#8407)
Adapt HTML template to updated tests

timeline.bodyText: Add a private constructor to hide the implicit public one.
